subject: Football
Radio
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lynch twice led the N.F.L. in interceptions as a defensive back for the New York Giants and later spent 40 years as a radio broadcaster for the team.
snippet: Mr. Lynch twice led the N.F.L. in interceptions as a defensive back for the New York Giants and later spent 40 years as a radio broadcaster for the team.
